name: Kishore Anna
greetingText: (Okay, we know it's not Italian, but it sounds kinda classy, right?)
wishText: May your next adventure be filled with bad jokes, questionable puns, and laughter that echoes through the halls!
text1: We were gonna write a sappy farewell...
textInChatBox: Kishore Anna, we'll miss your contagious energy, your terrible... I mean TERRIFIC dance moves, and...
text2: ...and all those moments you somehow turned work into a sitcom.
text3: But honestly, who are we kidding?
text4: You're going to rock this next chapter
outroText: Now, go forth and conquer! But seriously, don't be a stranger, okay?
replayText: Or click, if you need another dose of Kishore Anna awesomeness.
